test_cases.title: Successful login with valid username and password
test_cases.preconditions: User has a registered account with valid credentials
steps: Enter a valid username in the username field
Enter a valid password in the password field
Click on the Log In button
test_cases.expected_result: User is redirected to the account dashboard

test_cases.title: Successful login with valid email and password
test_cases.preconditions: User has a registered account with valid credentials
steps: Enter a valid email address in the username field
Enter a valid password in the password field
Click on the Log In button
test_cases.expected_result: User is redirected to the account dashboard

test_cases.title: Error message displayed for empty username
steps: Enter a valid password in the password field
Click on the Log In button
test_cases.expected_result: Error message is displayed indicating that both fields must be populated

test_cases.title: Error message displayed for empty password
steps: Enter a valid username in the username field
Click on the Log In button
test_cases.expected_result: Error message is displayed indicating that both fields must be populated

test_cases.title: Error message displayed for invalid credentials
test_cases.preconditions: User has an account but uses incorrect credentials
steps: Enter an invalid username in the username field
Enter an invalid password in the password field
Click on the Log In button
test_cases.expected_result: Error message is displayed indicating invalid credentials, input fields remain populated

test_cases.title: Error message displayed for partially filled fields
steps: Enter a valid username in the username field
Click on the Log In button
test_cases.expected_result: Error message is displayed indicating that both fields must be populated

test_cases.title: Login attempt with special characters in username and password
test_cases.preconditions: User has a registered account with valid credentials
steps: Enter a valid username with special characters in the username field
Enter a valid password with special characters in the password field
Click on the Log In button
test_cases.expected_result: User is redirected to the account dashboard

test_cases.title: Login attempt with maximum length username and password
test_cases.preconditions: User has a registered account with valid credentials
steps: Enter a username at maximum length in the username field
Enter a password at maximum length in the password field
Click on the Log In button
test_cases.expected_result: User is redirected to the account dashboard

test_cases.title: Submit with all fields filled correctly
test_cases.preconditions: All fields are filled with valid information
steps: Click on 'Find My Login Info' button
test_cases.expected_result: The page displays the appropriate recovery details

test_cases.title: Submit with one field left blank
test_cases.preconditions: All fields are filled except one
steps: Click on 'Find My Login Info' button
test_cases.expected_result: The page prompts the user to complete the blank field

test_cases.title: Submit with all fields left blank
steps: Click on 'Find My Login Info' button
test_cases.expected_result: The page prompts the user to complete all fields

test_cases.title: Submit with non-matching information
test_cases.preconditions: All fields are filled with non-matching information
steps: Enter a valid first name that does not match any record
Enter a valid last name that does not match any record
Enter a valid address that does not match any record
Enter a valid city that does not match any record
Select a valid state that does not match any record
Enter a valid zip code that does not match any record
Enter a valid SSN that does not match any record
Click on 'Find My Login Info' button
test_cases.expected_result: The page displays an error indicating no matching record found

test_cases.title: Submit with maximum length inputs
test_cases.preconditions: All fields are filled with maximum length valid information
steps: Enter a valid first name at maximum length
Enter a valid last name at maximum length
Enter a valid address at maximum length
Enter a valid city at maximum length
Enter a valid zip code at maximum length
Enter a valid SSN at maximum length
Click on 'Find My Login Info' button
test_cases.expected_result: The page displays the appropriate recovery details

test_cases.title: Submit with special characters in fields
test_cases.preconditions: All fields are filled with valid information including special characters
steps: Enter a valid first name with special characters
Enter a valid last name with special characters
Enter a valid address with special characters
Enter a valid city with special characters
Enter a valid zip code with special characters
Enter a valid SSN with special characters
Click on 'Find My Login Info' button
test_cases.expected_result: The page displays the appropriate recovery details

test_cases.title: Successful account registration
test_cases.expected_result: User account is created and user is automatically logged in

test_cases.title: Registration with missing first name
steps: Leave the first name field empty
test_cases.expected_result: Error message indicating first name is mandatory

test_cases.title: Registration with missing last name
steps: Leave the last name field empty
test_cases.expected_result: Error message indicating last name is mandatory

test_cases.title: Registration with missing address
test_cases.expected_result: Error message indicating address is mandatory

test_cases.title: Registration with missing city
test_cases.expected_result: Error message indicating city is mandatory

test_cases.title: Registration with missing state
test_cases.expected_result: Error message indicating state is mandatory

test_cases.title: Registration with missing zip code
steps: Leave the zip code field empty
test_cases.expected_result: Error message indicating zip code is mandatory

test_cases.title: Registration with missing phone number
steps: Leave the phone number field empty
test_cases.expected_result: Error message indicating phone number is mandatory

test_cases.title: Registration with missing SSN
test_cases.expected_result: Error message indicating SSN is mandatory

test_cases.title: Registration with missing username
test_cases.expected_result: Error message indicating username is mandatory

test_cases.title: Registration with missing password
test_cases.expected_result: Error message indicating password is mandatory

test_cases.title: Registration with missing confirm password
steps: Leave the confirm password field empty
test_cases.expected_result: Error message indicating confirm password is mandatory

test_cases.title: Registration with mismatched passwords
steps: Enter a different password in confirm password
test_cases.expected_result: Error message indicating passwords do not match

test_cases.title: Registration with special characters in username
steps: Enter a username with special characters
test_cases.expected_result: User account is created and user is automatically logged in

test_cases.title: Registration with maximum length inputs
steps: Enter a valid first name with maximum length
Enter a valid last name with maximum length
Enter a valid address with maximum length
Enter a valid city with maximum length
Enter a valid zip code with maximum length
Enter a valid phone number with maximum length
Enter a valid SSN with maximum length
Enter a valid username with maximum length
Enter a valid password with maximum length
Confirm the valid password with maximum length
test_cases.expected_result: User account is created and user is automatically logged in

test_cases.title: Open New Account with valid account type and funding source
test_cases.workflow: Open New Account with selected account type and funding source
test_cases.preconditions: User is logged in and has a valid funding source account
steps: Select an existing account as the funding source
Enter the required opening deposit amount
test_cases.expected_result: A new account is created, $100.00 is deducted from the funding source, and a unique account number is generated

test_cases.title: Open New Account without selecting a funding source
test_cases.workflow: Open New Account with selected account type and funding source
test_cases.preconditions: User is logged in and on the Open New Account page
steps: Enter the required opening deposit amount
test_cases.expected_result: An error message is displayed indicating that a funding source must be selected

test_cases.title: Open New Account with insufficient opening deposit
test_cases.workflow: Open New Account with selected account type and funding source
test_cases.preconditions: User is logged in and has a valid funding source account
steps: Select an existing account as the funding source
Enter an amount less than $100.00 as the opening deposit
test_cases.expected_result: An error message is displayed indicating that the opening deposit must be $100.00

test_cases.title: Open New Account with invalid funding source
test_cases.workflow: Open New Account with selected account type and funding source
test_cases.preconditions: User is logged in and on the Open New Account page
steps: Select a non-existing account as the funding source
Enter the required opening deposit amount
test_cases.expected_result: An error message is displayed indicating that the selected funding source is invalid

test_cases.title: Open New Account with special characters in account type
test_cases.workflow: Open New Account with selected account type and funding source
test_cases.preconditions: User is logged in and has a valid funding source account
steps: Select an account type with special characters
Select an existing account as the funding source
Enter the required opening deposit amount
test_cases.expected_result: The system processes the request and creates a new account with the specified account type

test_cases.title: Open New Account with maximum length account type
test_cases.workflow: Open New Account with selected account type and funding source
test_cases.preconditions: User is logged in and has a valid funding source account
steps: Select an account type with maximum allowed length
Select an existing account as the funding source
Enter the required opening deposit amount
test_cases.expected_result: The system processes the request and creates a new account with the specified account type

steps: Verify that the account number is visible

Verify that the combined total balance is visible

test_cases.title: Transfer funds with valid details
test_cases.preconditions: User is logged in and on the Transfer Funds page
steps: Enter a valid amount in the Amount field
Select a valid account number from the From account number dropdown
Select a valid account number from the To account number dropdown
test_cases.expected_result: Funds are successfully transferred and a confirmation message is displayed

test_cases.title: Transfer funds with zero amount
test_cases.preconditions: User is logged in and on the Transfer Funds page
steps: Select a valid account number from the From account number dropdown
Select a valid account number from the To account number dropdown
test_cases.expected_result: Error message is displayed indicating that the amount must be greater than zero

test_cases.title: Transfer funds with negative amount
test_cases.preconditions: User is logged in and on the Transfer Funds page
steps: Enter a negative amount in the Amount field
Select a valid account number from the From account number dropdown
Select a valid account number from the To account number dropdown
test_cases.expected_result: Error message is displayed indicating that the amount must be greater than zero

test_cases.title: Transfer funds with invalid From account number
test_cases.preconditions: User is logged in and on the Transfer Funds page
steps: Enter a valid amount in the Amount field
Select an invalid account number from the From account number dropdown
Select a valid account number from the To account number dropdown
test_cases.expected_result: Error message is displayed indicating that the From account number is invalid

test_cases.title: Transfer funds with invalid To account number
test_cases.preconditions: User is logged in and on the Transfer Funds page
steps: Enter a valid amount in the Amount field
Select a valid account number from the From account number dropdown
Select an invalid account number from the To account number dropdown
test_cases.expected_result: Error message is displayed indicating that the To account number is invalid

test_cases.title: Transfer funds with maximum allowable amount
test_cases.preconditions: User is logged in and on the Transfer Funds page
steps: Enter the maximum allowable amount in the Amount field
Select a valid account number from the From account number dropdown
Select a valid account number from the To account number dropdown
test_cases.expected_result: Funds are successfully transferred and a confirmation message is displayed

test_cases.title: Transfer funds with special characters in account numbers
test_cases.preconditions: User is logged in and on the Transfer Funds page
steps: Enter a valid amount in the Amount field
Select an account number containing special characters from the From account number dropdown
Select a valid account number from the To account number dropdown
test_cases.expected_result: Error message is displayed indicating that the From account number contains invalid characters

test_cases.title: Successful payment submission with all fields completed
steps: Enter a matching valid verify account number
Select a valid from account number
Click on the Send Payment button
test_cases.expected_result: Confirmation message appears upon successful transfer

test_cases.title: Error message for missing payee name
steps: Leave the payee name field empty
Enter a matching valid verify account number
Select a valid from account number
Click on the Send Payment button
test_cases.expected_result: Error message indicates that the payee name is required

test_cases.title: Error message for missing address
steps: Enter a matching valid verify account number
Select a valid from account number
Click on the Send Payment button
test_cases.expected_result: Error message indicates that the address is required

test_cases.title: Error message for missing city
steps: Enter a matching valid verify account number
Select a valid from account number
Click on the Send Payment button
test_cases.expected_result: Error message indicates that the city is required

test_cases.title: Error message for missing state
steps: Enter a matching valid verify account number
Select a valid from account number
Click on the Send Payment button
test_cases.expected_result: Error message indicates that the state is required

test_cases.title: Error message for missing zip code
steps: Leave the zip code field empty
Enter a matching valid verify account number
Select a valid from account number
Click on the Send Payment button
test_cases.expected_result: Error message indicates that the zip code is required

test_cases.title: Error message for missing phone number
steps: Leave the phone number field empty
Enter a matching valid verify account number
Select a valid from account number
Click on the Send Payment button
test_cases.expected_result: Error message indicates that the phone number is required

test_cases.title: Error message for missing account number
steps: Leave the account number field empty
Enter a matching valid verify account number
Select a valid from account number
Click on the Send Payment button
test_cases.expected_result: Error message indicates that the account number is required

test_cases.title: Error message for mismatched account numbers
steps: Enter a different verify account number
Select a valid from account number
Click on the Send Payment button
test_cases.expected_result: Error message indicates that the account numbers do not match

test_cases.title: Error message for missing amount
steps: Enter a matching valid verify account number
Select a valid from account number
Click on the Send Payment button
test_cases.expected_result: Error message indicates that the amount is required

test_cases.title: Error message for missing from account number
steps: Enter a matching valid verify account number
Leave the from account number field empty
Click on the Send Payment button
test_cases.expected_result: Error message indicates that the from account number is required

test_cases.title: Edge case for maximum length of payee name
steps: Enter a valid payee name at maximum length
Enter a matching valid verify account number
Select a valid from account number
Click on the Send Payment button
test_cases.expected_result: Confirmation message appears upon successful transfer

test_cases.title: Edge case for special characters in address
steps: Enter a valid address with special characters
Enter a matching valid verify account number
Select a valid from account number
Click on the Send Payment button
test_cases.expected_result: Confirmation message appears upon successful transfer

test_cases.title: Search for transaction with valid Transaction ID
test_cases.workflow: Search for transactions by Transaction ID
steps: Enter a valid Transaction ID in the input field
Click on the Find Transactions button
test_cases.expected_result: Matching transactions are displayed in the results table

test_cases.title: Search for transactions with a valid date
steps: Locate the input field for date
Enter a valid date in MM-DD-YYYY format
Click on the Find Transactions button
test_cases.expected_result: Matching transactions are displayed in the results table

test_cases.title: Search for transactions with valid date range
test_cases.workflow: Search for transactions by Date Range
steps: Enter a valid start date in MM-DD-YYYY format in the date range input field
Enter a valid end date in MM-DD-YYYY format in the date range input field
test_cases.expected_result: Matching transactions are displayed in the results table

test_cases.title: Search for transactions with a valid amount
steps: Locate the input field for 'Find by Amount'
Enter a valid transaction amount into the input field
test_cases.expected_result: Matching transactions are displayed in the results table

test_cases.title: Search for transaction with empty Transaction ID
test_cases.workflow: Search for transactions by Transaction ID
steps: Leave the Transaction ID input field empty
Click on the Find Transactions button
test_cases.expected_result: Inline validation message appears next to the input field indicating that the field is required

test_cases.title: Search for transaction with invalid Transaction ID format
test_cases.workflow: Search for transactions by Transaction ID
steps: Enter an invalid Transaction ID format in the input field
Click on the Find Transactions button
test_cases.expected_result: Inline validation message appears next to the input field indicating that the input is invalid

test_cases.title: Attempt to search without entering a date
steps: Locate the input field for date
Click on the Find Transactions button
test_cases.expected_result: An inline validation message appears next to the field indicating that the date is required

test_cases.title: Attempt to search with an invalid date format
steps: Locate the input field for date
Click on the Find Transactions button
test_cases.expected_result: An inline validation message appears next to the field indicating that the date format is invalid

test_cases.title: Attempt to search with empty date range fields
test_cases.workflow: Search for transactions by Date Range
steps: Leave the start date input field empty
Leave the end date input field empty
test_cases.expected_result: Inline validation messages appear next to both fields indicating they are required

test_cases.title: Attempt to search with invalid date format
test_cases.workflow: Search for transactions by Date Range
steps: Enter an invalid start date format in the date range input field
Enter an invalid end date format in the date range input field
test_cases.expected_result: Inline validation messages appear next to both fields indicating the format is incorrect

test_cases.title: Search for transactions with start date greater than end date
test_cases.workflow: Search for transactions by Date Range
steps: Enter a valid start date that is later than the end date in MM-DD-YYYY format in the date range input field
Enter a valid end date in MM-DD-YYYY format in the date range input field
test_cases.expected_result: Inline validation message appears indicating that the start date must be before the end date

test_cases.title: Attempt to search with an empty amount field
steps: Locate the input field for 'Find by Amount'
test_cases.expected_result: An inline validation message appears next to the field indicating that the amount is required

test_cases.title: Search for transactions with a date containing special characters
steps: Locate the input field for date
Enter a date with special characters
Click on the Find Transactions button
test_cases.expected_result: An inline validation message appears next to the field indicating that the date format is invalid

test_cases.title: Attempt to search with an invalid amount format
steps: Locate the input field for 'Find by Amount'
Enter an invalid amount format into the input field (e.g., letters or special characters)
test_cases.expected_result: An inline validation message appears next to the field indicating that the input is invalid

test_cases.title: Search for transaction with special characters in Transaction ID
test_cases.workflow: Search for transactions by Transaction ID
steps: Enter special characters in the Transaction ID input field
Click on the Find Transactions button
test_cases.expected_result: Inline validation message appears next to the input field indicating that the input is invalid

test_cases.title: Search for transaction with maximum length Transaction ID
test_cases.workflow: Search for transactions by Transaction ID
steps: Enter a Transaction ID that reaches the maximum allowed length in the input field
Click on the Find Transactions button
test_cases.expected_result: Matching transactions are displayed in the results table if the input is valid

test_cases.title: Search for transactions with a date in the future
steps: Locate the input field for date
Enter a future date in MM-DD-YYYY format
Click on the Find Transactions button
test_cases.expected_result: No transactions are displayed, or a message indicating no transactions found appears

test_cases.title: Search for transactions with a date at the boundary of valid input
steps: Locate the input field for date
Enter a date that is the earliest valid date in MM-DD-YYYY format
Click on the Find Transactions button
test_cases.expected_result: Matching transactions are displayed in the results table or a message indicating no transactions found appears

test_cases.title: Search for transactions with special characters in date fields
test_cases.workflow: Search for transactions by Date Range
steps: Enter a start date with special characters in the date range input field
Enter an end date with special characters in the date range input field
test_cases.expected_result: Inline validation messages appear next to both fields indicating the format is incorrect

test_cases.title: Search for transactions with maximum length date input
test_cases.workflow: Search for transactions by Date Range
steps: Enter a start date with the maximum allowed length in MM-DD-YYYY format in the date range input field
Enter an end date with the maximum allowed length in MM-DD-YYYY format in the date range input field
test_cases.expected_result: Matching transactions are displayed in the results table

test_cases.title: Search for transactions with a negative amount
steps: Locate the input field for 'Find by Amount'
Enter a negative transaction amount into the input field
test_cases.expected_result: An inline validation message appears next to the field indicating that the amount must be positive

test_cases.title: Search for transactions with a very large amount
steps: Locate the input field for 'Find by Amount'
Enter a very large transaction amount into the input field
test_cases.expected_result: Matching transactions are displayed in the results table if valid, or an inline validation message if not

test_cases.expected_result: Error message is displayed indicating down payment is mandatory

test_cases.title: Successful Logout
test_cases.preconditions: User is logged into the application
steps: Locate and click the logout button
test_cases.expected_result: User is returned to the login page

test_cases.title: Session Data Cleared After Logout
test_cases.preconditions: User is logged into the application
steps: Attempt to access a protected page
test_cases.expected_result: User is redirected to the login page and cannot access the protected page

test_cases.title: Access Account Information After Logout
test_cases.preconditions: User is logged into the application
steps: Attempt to access account information page
test_cases.expected_result: Access is denied and user is redirected to the login page

test_cases.title: Session Persistence Check After Logout
test_cases.preconditions: User is logged into the application
steps: Check if session storage or cookies still contain user data
test_cases.expected_result: No user data remains in session storage or cookies

test_cases.title: Logout Without Prior Login
test_cases.preconditions: User is not logged into the application
steps: Locate and click the logout button
test_cases.expected_result: No action is performed and user remains on the current page

test_cases.title: Logout with Special Characters in Session
test_cases.preconditions: User is logged into the application with special characters in session data
test_cases.expected_result: User is returned to the login page and no session data remains
